ModuleDescription:
This module aims to provide students the opportunity to
focus on the holistic needs of the older adultsâ€™ population
from health to ill health continuum. Students will examine
and apply theories and concepts of ageing, normal
physiologic and psychosocial changes and the
biopsychosocial issues associated with these processes,
in their encounter with older adults. This will enable the
students to promote health and well-being for this
population, whether well or sick.
